definition: Shandan county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The exploitation potential of Ganzhou region is the most in the middle reaches of the Heihe River, and Shandan County is the least.
sentences.chinese: 其中以甘州區水資源開發利用潛力最大，山丹縣最小。
